title: Service Learning-Based Real Estate Consulting Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic real estate concepts, project management fundamentals, and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Practicing professionals integrate academic theory and practical skills by providing real estate consulting for local small businesses, requiring digital device-supported online-offline collaboration.

learning_goals: Learners can conduct a feasibility analysis for a real estate development project and produce a report.
Learners can propose space optimization solutions for local small businesses and provide practical support.
Learners can build a collaborative network among experts, students, and the local community to design a sustainable partnership model.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
